mapper.sql: id, code, type, name, url, method, description, created_time AS createdTime, updated_time AS updatedTime, created_by AS createdBy, updated_by AS updatedBy
mapper.select: select r.id, r.code, r.type, r.name, r.method, r.url from resources r left join roles_resources_relation rr on r.id = rr.resource_id left join users_roles_relation ur on ur.role_id = rr.role_id left join users u on u.id = ur.user_id where u.id = #{userId}
select r.* from resources r left join roles_resources_relation rr on r.id = rr.resource_id left join roles ro on ro.id = rr.role_id where ro.code = #{roleCode}
